findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: Standard minting will no longer function once the token counter has reached a token ID that has already been custom minted.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The owner or a specified 'token owner' address can set the contract to Active or Inactive at any time, enabling or disabling users from initiating a swap, receiving refunds, or completing a swap.

findings.title: Token ID Counter Conflict
findings.description: Standard minting will no longer function once the token counter has reached a token ID that has already been custom minted.

findings.title: Unrestricted Target Decimals Update
findings.description: The owner can update the target decimals to any amount at any time, potentially leading to incorrect token conversions.

findings.title: Arbitrary Gas Fee Update
findings.description: The owner can update the gas fee to any amount at any time, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Users will not be able to complete their swap
findings.description: The owner's ability to deactivate the instance on the chain to withdraw from after funds are deposited prevents users from completing their swap.

findings.title: Inconsistent Pricing for Single and Bulk Stores
findings.description: The price for a single store and a bulk store are currently the same even though their prices are intended to be different.
